F1E0.Name: User Interface Board
F1E0.Description: There may be a problem with the cooktop control, user interface board(s), or associated wiring.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F1E1.Name: Control Relay Board
F1E1.Description: There may be a problem with the cooktop control(s) or the associated wiring.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F2E1.Name: Stuck Key
F2E1.Description: There may be a problem with the user interface board(s).
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F6E0.Name: User Interface Connection
F6E0.Description: There may be a problem with the control(s), the user interface board(s), or the associated wiring.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F6E4.Name: Control Status
F6E4.Description: There may be a problem with the main control.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F6E6.Name: Main Control Connection
F6E6.Description: There may be a problem with the main control or the associated wiring.
StepsToRepair: There may be a problem with the main control or the associated wiring.
Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F6E9.Name: Secondary Control Connection
F6E9.Description: There may be a problem with the secondary control or the associated wiring.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F6EA.Name: User Interface Over Temperature
F6EA.Description: There may be a problem with the user interface board(s).
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart the cycle and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

F9E0.Name: Power Input
F9E0.Description: There may be a problem with the power wiring to the product.
StepsToRepair: Reset power to the product by following the subsequent steps
Power unit down by turning off the circuit breaker(s) for one (1) minute.
Power unit up by turning on the circuit breaker(s).
Restart unit and monitor the cooktop for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify cooktop operation.
If the problem persists, call 1-800-JENN-AIR (536-6247) for Service.

ControlLockOn.Name: Control Lock
ControlLockOn.Description: Receive a notification when remote control has been enabled or disabled.

CookTopTurnedOn.Name: Cooktop On
CookTopTurnedOn.Description: Receive a notification when the cooktop is turned on

CooktopLeftOn.Name: Cooktop Left On
CooktopLeftOn.Description: Receive a notification when your Cooktop is left on for a predefined amount of time that you select

Griddle.Name: Griddle
Griddle.Description: A multi-layer stainless steel griddle with an aluminum core that works on modular induction cooktops as well as select gas cooktops.

Flat Bottom Wok.Name: Flat Bottom Wok
Flat Bottom Wok.Description: This exquisite flat bottom wok is designed for a range of cooking techniques such as steaming, stir frying, braising, poaching and more. This versatile pan with induction technology is essential to any cooking enthusiast kitchen.

Cooktop Cleaning Kit.Name: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaning Kit
Cooktop Cleaning Kit.Description: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaning Kit includes a scraper and scrub pad that remove build-up and cooked-on spills without scratching or harming your cooktop surfaces and a non-abrasive cleaner that is safe for all glass and ceramic cooktops. Use monthly or as needed to polish your cooktop and keep it looking like new.

Cooktop Cleaner.Name: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaner
Cooktop Cleaner.Description: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaner is specially formulated to cut through tough, cooked-on residues that can linger on your cooktop. Use monthly or as needed to polish your cooktop with a streak-free shine1.

Cooktop Cleaning Wipes.Name: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaning Wipes
Cooktop Cleaning Wipes.Description: Affresh® Cooktop Cleaning Wipes are specially formulated, dual-sided wipes with a scrubber side to remove everyday residues and a smooth side to leave your ceramic cooktop shiny and sparkling with a streak-free finish.

MobileKeys.infoIcon.key: Remotely disable the control panel to avoid unintended use no matter where you are.
MobileKeys.infoUntreated.key: Leaving your cooktop unattended while in use is not recommended.
MobileKeys.infoSetKitchenTimer.key: Setting a timer will alert you when it's time to check your food; the element will not turn off when the timer ends.
MobileKeys.infoCooktopOnNotify.key: This notification will appear when your cooktop has been left on for the amount of time set below. Whatever you set is your liability and is not the responsibility of KitchenAid.

Burner-1.Name: Element-1
Burner-1.Description: 6'' 1200-Watt Round Element -- This element is ideal for lower heat cooking, like simmering sauces and warming foods, in cookware up to 6” in diameter.

Burner-2.Name: Element-2
Burner-2.Description: 12"/9"/6" Triple-Choice™ Element -- This versatile element is perfect for everything from high-heat cooking, like boiling liquids and sauces, searing and browning meats, and frying; to lower heat techniques, like simmering sauces or keeping foods warm.  The triple element design incorporates a 12 " outer element, a 9” middle element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a large variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots.

Burner-3.Name: Element-3
Burner-3.Description: 6'' 1200-Watt Round Element -- This element is ideal for lower heat cooking, like simmering sauces and warming foods, in cookware up to 6” in diameter

Burner-4.Name: Element-4
Burner-4.Description: 10"/6" Dual-Choice™ Element -- This versatile element is perfect for everything from high-heat cooking, like boiling liquids and sauces, searing and browning meats, and frying; to lower heat techniques, such as simmering sauces or keeping foods warm. The dual element design incorporates a 10 " outer element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots

Burner-6.Name: Element-6
Burner-6.Description: 10"/6" Dual-Choice™ Element -- This versatile element is perfect for everything from high-heat cooking, like boiling liquids and sauces, searing and browning meats, and frying; to lower heat techniques, such as simmering sauces or keeping foods warm. The dual element design incorporates a 10 " outer element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots.

Burner-2.Name: Element-2
Burner-2.Description: 6'' Simmer/Melt Element -- This high - precision element that has a wide range of power,able to melt chocolate and butter and offers lower heat cooking,like simmering sauces,poaching,and warming foods,in cookware up to 6” in diameter.

Burner-3.Name: Element-3
Burner-3.Description: 10"/6" High Power Dual-Choice™ Element with Simmer Setting -- This versatile element is perfect for everything from high-heat cooking, like boiling liquids and sauces, searing and browning meats, and frying; to lower heat techniques, such as simmering sauces or keeping foods warm. The dual element design incorporates a 10 "outer element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots.

Burner-5.Name: Element-5
Burner-5.Description: 12"/9"/6" Triple-Choice™ Element -- This versatile element is perfect for everything from high-heat cooking, like boiling liquids and sauces, searing and browning meats, and frying; to lower heat techniques, like simmering sauces or keeping foods warm.  The triple element design incorporates a 12 " outer element,a 9” middle element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a large variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots.

Burner-6.Name: Element-6
Burner-6.Description: 6'' Simmer/Melt Element -- This high - precision element that has a wide range of power,able to melt chocolate and butter and offers lower heat cooking,like simmering sauces,poaching,and warming foods,in cookware up to 6” in diameter.

Burner-2.Name: Element-2
Burner-2.Description: 8'' 1800-Watt Round Element -- This element is ideal for boiling smaller amounts of soups  and sauces, as well as, simmering and warming foods, in cookware up to 8” in diameter.

Burner-3.Name: Element-3
Burner-3.Description: 10"/6"Dual - Choice™ Element--This versatile element is perfect for everything from high - heat cooking,like boiling liquids and sauces,searing and browning meats,and frying;to lower heat techniques,such as simmering sauces or keeping foods warm.The dual element design incorporates a 10 " outer element and a 6 " inner element to accommodate a variety of cookware sizes from small saucepans to large stock pots.
